c-0: ^ You: I am Alex, great hero of Atua Motu. Enemy of anyone who disturbs its peace!
c-1: ^ You: I am Alex, your humble servant. Please accept my service.
c-2: ^Ochano: DO NOT WASTE MY TIME WITH YOUR SILENCE, FOOL.
c-3: ^ You: Give me your name and I shall give you mine.
^Ochano: HOW DARE YOU TURN IT AROUND ON ME? I WILL SMITE YOU.
g-0: ^You fail in your mission, and Ochano kills you. -

q2: ^Ochano: IF YOU CAN SOLVE MY RIDDLE, I WILL ENTERTAIN YOU.
